name: Nmap Network Scan
info: The standard for network discovery and security auditing. Scans ports and detects OS versions.

name: EmailHarvester
info: Scrapes search engines (Google, Bing, PGP) to find email addresses associated with a domain.

name: DMitry
info: Deepmagic Information Gathering Tool. Gathers subdomains, emails, uptime info, and tcp port scan.

name: DNSenum
info: Multithreaded script to enumerate DNS information of a domain and discover non-contiguous ip blocks.

name: OWASP Amass
info: In-depth attack surface mapping and asset discovery using open source information gathering.

name: Sublist3r
info: Fast sub-domain enumeration tool using OSINT engines like Baidu, Yahoo, and VirusTotal.

name: Photon Crawler
info: Incredibly fast crawler designed for OSINT. Extracts URLs, emails, social accounts, and files.

name: Sherlock
info: Hunts down social media accounts by username across 300+ social networks.

name: Fierce DNS
info: DNS reconnaissance tool for locating non-contiguous IP space.

name: AutoRecon
info: Multi-threaded reconnaissance tool that automates service enumeration.

name: Nikto Web Scan
info: Web server scanner that tests for dangerous files, outdated versions, and config issues.

name: Wapiti
info: Web application vulnerability scanner that audits the security of your websites (Black-box).

name: SQLMap Injection
info: Automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool. Detects and exploits flaws.

name: Commix
info: Automated all-in-one OS command injection and exploitation tool.

name: WhatWeb
info: Next-gen web scanner. Identifies CMS, blogging platforms, statistic/analytics packages.

name: WPScan
info: WordPress security scanner. Checks for vulnerable plugins, themes, and configuration backups.

name: JoomScan
info: OWASP Joomla! Vulnerability Scanner. Detects firewall misconfigs and vulnerable components.

name: Gobuster Dir
info: Directory/File, DNS and VHost busting tool written in Go. Fast and lightweight.

name: WAFW00F
info: Identifies and fingerprints Web Application Firewall (WAF) products protecting a website.

name: DavTest
info: Tests WebDAV enabled servers by uploading test executable files.

name: TruffleHog
info: Searches for secrets, API keys, and credentials specifically in files and repositories.

name: SearchSploit
info: Command line search tool for Exploit-DB. Finds exploits for identified software versions.
